div.head: 眼翻不下
div.div: eyes turned upward without coming down

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: eyes turned upward without coming down

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with shang shi 上視 , vision turned upward. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry deng huo 燈火 quotes Xiao er jing feng mi jue 小兒驚風秘訣 : 眼翻不下者，焠其臍上下 , “In case of eyes turned upward without coming down , apply hot compresses to above and below the [patient’s] navel”.
